entry.title: Cannaco CBD Topical Salve - 300mg/100ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cannaco
Type: CBD Oil
Price: 162.50

Cannaco's Organic Topical Salve (300mg/100ml) combats stiffness, joint pain and muscle fatigue when applied topically to the affected area.

  • Certified USDA Organic Broad Terpene Spectrum CBD
  • Provides soothing relief for pains and aches
  • Works with your body's own endocannibinoid system to heal and support optimum health
  • Contains natural ingredients specifically selected for their pain relieving qualities - free from any herbicides, pesticides, GMO products, solvents or any other form of additive
  • Will not give you a 'high'
  • Strength: 300mg / 100ml

Ingredients

Certified USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD, Natural Salve Base, Organic Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Neem Oil, Hemp Seed Oil, Essential Oils, Citrus Bioflavonoids (Colour-Free, Paraben-Free)

Directions for use

Apply Organic CBD Salve to the specific affected area.

entry.title: Cannaco CBD Gummies: A delicious dose of CBD!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cannaco
Type: CBD Oil
Price: 136.00

Cannaco's CBD Gummies are a delicious way to get your daily dose of CBD. Each gummy contains 4 mg CBD oil and there are 15 gummies in a packet (5 days at 3 gummies per day). (90 g)

  • 15 delicious CBD infused gummies in a packet
  • Each gummy delivers a 4 mg Certified USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD dose right into your Endocannabinoid System
  • Three gummies per day provide the recommended dose of 12 mg
  • Cannaco CBD oil is free from any herbicides, pesticides, GMO products, solvents or any other form of additive
  • Contains THC at the legal limit of <0.3% (will cause no “high”)
  • CBD helps maintain an optimal level of homeostasis
  • Reduces inflammation, chronic pain, insomnia, headaches and other serious diseases/health issues

Ingredients

Certified USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD, Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Gelatine, Corn Starch, Acidity Regulators, Flavouring, Colourants and Glazing Agents

Glazing Agents: Beeswax (E); Candelilla wax (E); Carnauba wax (E)
Acidity Regulators: Citric Acid

Flavouring and Colorants: Natural and artificial food colouring and flavouring

Directions for use

We recommend to start with 1 gummy if you are sensitive or new to CBD edibles, building up to 3 gummies per day. As all people, and their health needs, are different, the recommended dosage of CBD oil will vary from person to person, depending on their constitution, lifestyle and needs. 

For kids: start with half gummy (max one).

Note: Should not be taken by those with ADD/ADHD or sensory disorders due to sugar content. Instead, we recommend using Pure MCT CBD Oil - Certified USDA! (15ml) or Pure MCT CBD Oil - Certified USDA! (30ml).
entry.s:tag: Cannaco Wholesale Distributor in South Africa

entry.title: Cannaco CBD Cookies - a delicious, therapeutic snack! (Vanilla)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cannaco
Type: CBD Oil
Price: 136.00

Cannaco's Organic Vanilla CBD Cookies contains 15 servings of relaxation and wellness!

  • Reduces stress, aches, inflammation, insomnia, anxiety and ADHD
  • Broad Terpene Spectrum CBD Oil paired with MCT (Medium Chain Triglycerides)
  • Contains THC at the legal limit of <0.3% (will cause no “high”). THC is synergistic with the other cannabinoids in the formula and enhances their value and absorption
  • Cannaco CBD oil is Co2 extracted and completely free from any herbicides, pesticides, GMO products, solvents or any other form of additive. 
  • Works with your body's own endocannibinoid system to heal and support optimum health

  • Strength: 15 Biscuits // 150mg Broad Spectrum CBD // 10mg per Biscuit

Ingredients

Certified Broad Spectrum CBD, Salt, Butter, Sugar, Vanilla Essence, Wheat Flour, Potassium Sorbate, Baking Soda, Eggs, Baking Powder.

How to use

Start with 1/2 biscuit and wait for 10 – 15 minutes before increasing the dosage. Max recommended dosage – 1 Biscuit. Each biscuit contains 10mg Broad Spectrum CBD.

Kids: max a quarter of a biscuit (preferably before bed).

Store in a cool dry place.

entry.title: CBD Oil Paired with MCT - 400mg/30ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cannaco
Type: CBD Oil
Price: 335.00

Cannaco's CBD Oil (400mg/30ml) is a clear blend of certified USDA Organic Broad Terpene Spectrum CBD, paired with MCT (Medium Chain Triglycerides), a translucent, tasteless, odorless and rapidly digested carrier oil. Fresh, minty taste!

  • MCT oil is mainly used by people looking to lose weight, as they encourage the use of fat for energy rather than for storage and reduces appetite
  • MCT oil boosts athletes endurance during a workout
  • MCT oil improves brain functioning and the ability to think, as well as helps with forms of dementia
  • MCT oil also acts as an antimicrobial, antibacterial and antiviral
  • Cannaco CBD oil is Co2 extracted and free from any herbicides, pesticides, GMO products, solvents or any other form of additive
  • Contains THC at the legal limit of <0.3% (will cause no “high”)
  • CBD helps maintain an optimal level of homeostasis
  • Reduces inflammation, chronic pain, headaches and other serious diseases/health issues

Ingredients

Certifed USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD, MCT Oil, Lecithin, Biodegradable Preservative (Pureganic)

Directions for use

To take CBD oil first hold it under the tongue to be absorbed in the mouth prior to swallowing. Start with 10 drops, twice a day. It is recommended that you begin with a lower dose and slowly increase until you feel the desired results are maintained. As all people, and their health needs, are different, the recommended dosage of CBD oil will vary from person to person, depending on their constitution, lifestyle and needs.
entry.s:tag: Cannaco Wholesale Distributor in South Africa

entry.title: Organic CBD Lip Butter - 10mg/15ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cannaco
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 30.00

Cannaco's Organic CBD Oil Lip Butter (10mg/15ml) helps to regenerate healthy cells in your lips, and protects your lips from external factors such as UV rays and dry air!

  • Certified USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD
  • CBD helps cells to regenerate, giving you extra smooth, healthy lips
  • Heals and protects lips from UV damage (sun exposure), wind, pollution and dry air
  • Contains fatty acids and Omega oils to moisturise and heal chapped lips
  • Strength: 10mg CBD/14g
  • Works with your body's own endocannibinoid system to heal and support optimum health
  • Contains natural ingredients specifically selected for their pain relieving qualities - free from any herbicides, pesticides, GMO products, solvents or any other form of additive
  • Will not give you a 'high'

Ingredients

Certified USDA Organic Broad Spectrum CBD, Avocado Butter (Fragrance Free, Colour Free, Paraben Free), Organic Neem Oil, Hemp Seed Oil, Natural Flavours, Organic Coconut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Beeswax, 100% Organic, Biodegradable Preservative (Pureganic), Potassium Sorbate

Directions for use

Apply topically to lips as needed.
